content: this diamond trellis basket is worked in the round from the base up - so no seaming required the pattern makes use of post stitches to improve the stiffness of the finished basket you can easily customise your basket to be larger or smaller than the example shown which is 9 inches wide by increasing or decreasing the size of the base the basket is worked holding 3 strands of dk yarn together - so you can mix your choice of colours if preferred or substitute 2 strands of worsted weight yarn instead august update - there s now a video on how to make the stitch used for this basket link is on the pattern october update now available in french - thanks to madlaine for translating it find it here 1 1 http //www planete-laine com/2014/10/modele-panier-au-crochet-gratuit html
